text: Hanki Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Saioni kumate mofanemo'za zamavufaga ata nere'za, zamavufaga ra huza vano nehu'za, zamagazea eri amne hu'za zamavu masavea hu'za vano nehaze. Ana nehu'za zamasenia antesga hu'za vano nehu'za, zamanankena eri fatgo hu'za vano nehu'za, zamagia avozare'ma kama vanoma nehazageno'a, zamagiafima hu'naza avasese zamo'a ankro ankro nehie.
